data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Bayburt, Turkey a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bayburt, Turkey
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Bayburt to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Bayburt, Turkey will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 28 believers in Bayburt, Turkey a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Zaza-Alevi people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Zaza-Alevi people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Zaza-Alevi people is yours.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Bayburt.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Bayburt, Turkey.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bayburt, Turkey has a population of 75,600.

We estimate Bayburt has 28 people who might know Jesus, 423 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 75,148 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,699 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Bayburt, Turkey to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.
